directory.name: src
directory.purpose: The `src` directory houses the source code for a temporary Todo application project, including components, hooks, types, utility functions, and asset files.

subdirectories.name: assets
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\assets` directory stores the asset files used by the project's source code.

subdirectories.name: components
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\components`, houses the individual source code components for a Todo application, including input, item display, filtering, list management, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: hooks
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\hooks` directory stores the React hook source code for a temporary project repository.

subdirectories.name: types
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\types` directory stores the type definitions for a project's source code.

subdirectories.name: utils
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\utils` directory contains utility functions and resources used by the project residing in the temporary repository `repo-b05c64d6-54f2-45a0-b03e-fda55ff0685d-1750682884431`.
